testCase.name: Specification listing should be able to listing specifications
Create user should be able to create a new user
Create user should not be able to create a new user with email in use
Create user should not be able to create a new user with username in use
Category listing shoud be able to listing categories
Category creation should be able to create a new category
Category creation should not be able to create a new category with name exists
User authentication should be able to authenticate an user
User authentication shout not be able to authenticate an nonexistent user
User authentication shout not be able to authenticate with incorrect password
Specification creation should be able to create a new specification
Specification creation should not be able to create a new specification with name exists
